rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall designed to provide a welcoming entry with traditional Kerala wood carvings and local stone flooring.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: A comfortable living room area that opens towards the central courtyard, providing natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: An integrated dining area adjacent to the living room with Vastu principles ensuring auspicious alignment.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen with modern amenities and traditional Kerala design touches, located close to the dining area for convenience.

rooms.name: washroom
rooms.description: A guest washroom near the entrance, ensuring easy access and privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance door with local stone facade, ensuring secure entry while adhering to traditional aesthetics.
Large windows allowing natural light and maintaining the vastu alignment by orienting towards the south-east for prosperity.
Balcony door providing access to the exterior courtyard, enhancing ventilation in accordance with local building norms.

courtyard.name: central_courtyard
courtyard.description: A central open space that forms the heart of the Nalukettu design, promoting natural light and air circulation. It also acts as a communal area for family activities.

swimming_pool.description: A recreational swimming pool integrated at the rear of the apartment, designed to complement the traditional aesthetics while offering relaxation.

rooms.name: master_bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom designed with ample space and privacy, featuring a private balcony overlooking the courtyard.

rooms.name: bedroom_2
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom with traditional Kerala style design, ensuring comfort and privacy.

rooms.name: bedroom_3
rooms.description: Another bedroom accommodating guests or family members, designed for versatility and comfort.

rooms.name: ensuite_bathroom
rooms.description: A private bathroom attached to the master bedroom for convenience and privacy.

openings.description: Large windows in the master bedroom ensure natural light and maintain a connection with the courtyard.
A balcony door providing fresh air and a view of the garden area.
